jobs.title: iOS Engineer

jobs.title: PR Manager
jobs.description: We’re looking for someone to execute on our ambitious PR goals and help define what the world thinks of Monzo.

jobs.title: SaaS Sales Executive
jobs.description: Looking for sales execs that have 2 + years experience either in a quota carrying role, or as an overachiever in an Inside Sales/Sales Development capacity and want to take the next step into full cycle sales.

jobs.title: Account Executive
jobs.description: The Guidebook team is seeking confident, driven Account Executive to join our team in London.

jobs.title: Sales Account Manager
jobs.description: Join a team that are a passionate and are responsible for finding renters the great homes in London!

jobs.title: Sales Development Representative
jobs.description: Our sales function is newly formed so, as the second Sales Development Representative, there is enormous scope for a talented individual to progress quickly and have real impact on how this team is formed over the next few years.

jobs.title: Sales Associate
jobs.description: We are looking for a Sales Associate to identify, negotiate and close new business sales opportunities.

jobs.title: Selection and Outreach Co-ordinator
jobs.description: We have a newly created role for a Selection and Outreach Co-ordinator to work closely with the Data Analytics Manager to facilitate the selection process and enhance our outreach efforts.

jobs.title: EA to Founder/CEO
jobs.description: We are looking to recruit an intelligent, pro-active and client-centric EA/Business analyst, who will provide crucial support for our eacting founder & CEO.

jobs.title: Senior Tech Researcher
jobs.description: The role would suite a bight graduate with at least three years' relevant company research and excellent project mangement experience.

jobs.title: 2 Year Graduate Programme
jobs.description: We have launched a two year grad entreprenuership programme.

jobs.title: Client Success Manager
jobs.description: Qnary is growing quickly and hiring talented tech-savvy professionals to complement the team.

jobs.title: Bar Tender
jobs.description: As the bartender, you will be responsible for the security of all money and liquor behind the bar.

jobs.title: Line Cook
jobs.description: We need a line cook for our kitchen.

jobs.title: Kitchen Prep
jobs.description: We need a kitchen prep for our kitchen.

jobs.title: Director of Marketing and Admissions
jobs.description: We are delighted to be working with Rye St Antony School to appoint the school's first Director of Marketing and Admissions.This is an exciting opportunity to work closely with the new Head, as a member of the Senior Leadership Team to develop and implement marketing and recruitment strategies for this Catholic day and boarding school.

jobs.title: Customer Services Team Member
jobs.description: The overall objective of the Customer Service Team Member involves working as part of the Customer Services team to ensure departmental targets are met as a whole, working with your line manager to promote change that will facilitate improvement of the customer experience and ensure continued high standards of quality and productivity are maintained.

jobs.title: Front End Web Developer
jobs.description: The successful Front End Web Developer will work with a range of other Full Stack Developers to design, build, test and deploy production ready web applications.

jobs.title: Full Stack Web Developer
jobs.description: The successful Full Stack Web Developer, Web Developer will work with a range of other Web Developers to design, build, test and deploy production ready web applications.

jobs.title: Project Administrator
jobs.description: Our successful Project Administrator, Project Management Co - Ordinator will assist with the coordination of project management activities, resources, equipment and information.

jobs.title: Project Manager
jobs.description: Our successful Project Manager will create and successfully execute project plans whilst defining and managing project scope, goals and deliverables.

jobs.title: React Web Developer
jobs.description: As we grow our fleet of autonomous vehicles, we require state-of-the-art tools to assist with fleet management, data visualisation and analysis. You will be responsible for developing software components and tools to support the development and operations work by providing web solutions that enable remote workflows and UIs that put our complex software into the hands of the customer.

jobs.title: Senior Software Engineer (Python)
jobs.description: Our successful Senior Software Developer, Senior Software Engineer, Python Architect, Python Developer will take ownership of our Python software development approach across the company, making ultimate architectural decisions based on various opinions from other product teams as well as your own knowledge.

jobs.title: SEO Executive
jobs.description: Papier is looking to grow its SEO team with an experienced SEO Executive. This role will support the SEO & Web Manager in day-to-day optimisation of the Papier websites from a technical, on-page and content perspective, in order to grow our visibility within organic search in the UK and key international markets (USA, Australia, France, Germany and more).

jobs.title: Operations Associate
jobs.description: Papier is looking for an Operations Associate to manage the supply chain on a day-to-day basis and help drive improvements to ensure we always have stock where and when we need it. This role will report into the Supply Chain & Operations Manager.

jobs.title: Brand Content Creator
jobs.description: We are looking for a creative individual who thrives in a fast-growing, resourceful team to create beautiful content for our brand’s online community. This is an exciting role, requiring a mix of creative talent and strong photography ability.

jobs.title: Midweight Stationery Designer
jobs.description: We are looking for a strong team player to join us on our journey in establishing Papier as the leading online brand in personalised printing.

jobs.title: Performance Marketing Manager
jobs.description: Papier is looking to grow its performance marketing team with a Performance Marketing Manager who will play a key role in driving the performance of a portfolio of paid search and paid social campaigns, both within the UK and internationally.

jobs.title: Print Operations Manager
jobs.description: Papier is looking for an Operations and Print Specialist to work across the whole product process from leveraging print expertise in product concepting to ensuring 3rd party printers are delivering orders on time and to the right quality. This role will report into the Supply Chain & Operations Manager.

jobs.title: Data Analyst - Product and Growth
jobs.description: We’re looking for a Data Analyst who can help drive product improvements and advance our business intelligence capabilities, then step back and help team members determine what it all means. You’ll be working with our Senior Data Analyst to derive insights that drive product development, and build, automate and provide data to our end users in a simple and effective way.

jobs.title: Senior Account Manager
jobs.description: The Senior Account Manager will be responsible for our partner retention and growth and must have a strong understanding of how promoters and venues in Paris work, and the ability to identify and articulate how DICE is a uniquely powerful tool to support them.

jobs.title: Technical Support Engineer
jobs.description: We’re looking for a Technical Support Engineer to join our team in London. Your primary focus will be providing tech support to fans & internal teams in Europe, North America and Australia.

jobs.title: Copywriter / Editorial Assistant
jobs.description: We're looking for people who can speak and write Italian at the native level; and have editorial/copywriting work experience of 1+ years in Italian

jobs.title: Global Comms Manager
jobs.description: We’re looking for a Global Comms Manager to become our second ever Comms hire and help tell the DICE story to fans, the music industry and investors in every new market DICE lands in.

jobs.title: Head of Global Operations
jobs.description: We’re looking for an experienced Head of Global Operations to support our rapid global expansion and execute with excellence.

jobs.title: Revenue Analyst
jobs.description: In this role you will be able to apply a combination of data analysis, commercial and stakeholder management skills in order to support and contribute to our revenue strategy.

jobs.title: Senior UX Designer
jobs.description: We’re looking for a UX designer that doesn’t shy away from finding intuitive and simple solutions to traditionally complicated problems. You will be working closely with a team of product managers and researchers to convert high-level strategy into engaging, user-centric experiences in our mobile app.

jobs.title: Statistician
jobs.description: We’re looking for an experienced Statistician to join our Data Team to help us make sense of our quantitative data to identify trends and support our predictions. We want a team player who has a commercial mindset, someone who can advance our business intelligence capabilities and then take a step back to help the team determine what it all means.

jobs.title: Quality Assurance Tester
jobs.description: We are looking for a conscientious individual who has the ability to read and follow complex specifications with the view to creating test plans that can either be automated or performed manually depending on the needs of the project. We’d like an individual with finance experience, ideally, that can come on board and work with us on perfecting our testing process.

jobs.title: Internal Recruiter
jobs.description: We are looking for an experienced Internal Recruiter with a proven track record to join our growing team. AccessPay are all about our people meaning it’s crucial that we attract and retain the right talent. Working closely with HR and other departments within the business, you will lead a recruitment drive to recruit and develop a people pipeline at all levels.

jobs.title: Office Manager
jobs.description: As the Office Manger you will be overseeing the day to day management of the office and helping to create a positive environment. This role would suit a confident individual who enjoys a busy and varied work environment and someone who can make the role their own.

jobs.title: Customer Success Manager
jobs.description: The primary objective of the Customer Success Manager is to drive customer satisfaction, growth and retention of customer accounts. The Customer Success Manager is the primary point of contact for customer post-sale and responsible for coordinating company resources to meet account objectives.

jobs.title: Account Manager
jobs.description: Competitive, negotiable salary & excellent company benefits

jobs.title: New Business Director
jobs.description: Are you the proactive, creative and collaborative person we’ve been looking for to help us drive our New Business strategy? You could be the ideal person to join our team and help take Apadmi to the next level as our New Business Director.

jobs.title: Front-End Software Developer
jobs.description: Are you an experienced software engineer with a focus on front-end development? Do you find the UI a thing of beauty, wanting to push creative boundaries with the websites and portals you build? Are you interested in working for one of the UK’s leading mobile technology companies?

jobs.title: Project Manager
jobs.description: Are you effective at managing team members to deliver high-quality software development projects to strict deadlines? Do you have the foresight and experience to allocate the right resource to a project, whilst maintaining a critical eye to track its progress against agreed plans?

jobs.title: Android Developer
jobs.description: We are looking for a highly motivated, self-starting individuals with the ability to research, innovate and work effectively in a dynamic team. You will play a leading role in our mobile engineering practive, implementing new feawtures, building more efficient systems and improving performance, and building beautiful user interfaces.

jobs.title: CRM Executive
jobs.description: One of our excellent CRM Executives has gone to have a baby and we are looking for an equally excellent replacement for the next 12 month as a maternity cover. With the way things are growing at boohoo, this may well turn into a perm role after that. Our digital marketing team is super friendly and very supportive so you will never be left alone to your own devices, however you will ideally need 2 years experience in a similar role to be considered.

jobs.title: C++ / Python Engineers
jobs.description: An exciting opportunity for C++ and Python developers to join Cubic Motion Ltd, a world-leading provider of facial animation technology, with roles on offer in both Manchester and Pinewood Studios.

jobs.title: Production Manager
jobs.description: Reporting to the Director of Production, you undertake a critical role in managing the Production team to ensure the successful delivery of multiple, high-quality client projects, in line with agreed schedules and budgets. The role will require day-to-day management of our large and growing production team, maintaining clear communication with our team of Producers, Lead Animators and other business stakeholders. It will continue to build on existing strong client relationships.

jobs.title: Lead / Senior Programmer
jobs.description: vTime is a global leader in xR, creating innovative and engaging experiences and technology in all the new realities - virtual, augmented and mixed. We're looking for a senior programmer to lead a new technical initiative, using prototype hardware and software.

jobs.title: Creative Project Manager
jobs.description: Loeb.NYC is looking for a Digital Creative Project Manager to support our digital media initiatives and campaigns. In this role, you will oversee the creative pipeline for multiple startups and projects. You should be able to easily transition between the mindset of a designer and that of a marketing analyst. We’re looking for someone who is self-directed, highly organized, who thrives on balancing and delivering for multiple projects and deadlines.

jobs.title: Growth Marketing Manager - Acquisition
jobs.description: Loeb.nyc is an early stage startup investor and incubator. We are looking for an experienced Growth Marketing Manager who will work directly with early stage portfolio companies and help drive customer acquisition and engagement across paid channels. This is an opportunity to have large scale impact on success of multiple early stage startups.

jobs.title: SEO & Content Specialist
jobs.description: As an SEO & Content Specialist on the Growth team, you’ll enhance our search and content marketing efforts through technical optimizations and content strategy. You’ll build our authority in Google and other search engines by partnering with content marketers and engineers to establish best practices, create new content assets and optimize existing pages according to best practices.

jobs.title: Customer Experience Specialist
jobs.description: Helix is an innovative direct-to-consumer sleep brand aiming to change the way people sleep by bringing customization to the sleep category through individually personalized, custom-made mattresses for you, based on how you sleep.

jobs.title: Mid Market Account Executive in New York
jobs.description: On the back of our extensive growth, we are looking to build on the great momentum we have already established globally and are now looking for Mid Market account executive to join our dynamic team in NYC. As an Account Executive mid markets, you will use your strategic selling skills to educate prospects on the benefits and value and importance of proper email sending. You will serve as a trusted consultant, share insights and continually seek opportunities to grow your market to become as successful as possible.

jobs.title: Senior Product Manager - B2B SaaS
jobs.description: As a Senior Product Manager you will play a key role in crafting and driving forward the product vision. You will be responsible for defining and executing on the product roadmap by working collaboratively with both the market facing functions (sales, marketing, customer success) and on a day-to-day basis with the development team.

jobs.title: Marketing Internship for a HealthTech Start-up
jobs.description: We are looking for a marketing intern to support the CancerIQ inbound marketing activities. The internship will be ideal for someone who is interested in a holistic view of the marketing function, including marketing automation, email marketing, social media marketing, content development, event marketing, etc.

jobs.title: Account Executive
jobs.description: We are seeking Account Executives with a passion for novel technology in big markets. We are targeting mid-market organizations and large enterprises in all verticals, and especially Financial Services and Healthcare, with a focus on their governance, risk, and compliance (GRC) activities. We are disrupting the GRC and BPM software industries by providing a solution end users can self-manage, saving enterprises huge amounts of time and money.

jobs.title: Software Engineer
jobs.description: We are seeking a talented and highly motivated individual to apply their skills and knowledge to develop exciting solutions in support of a Continuous Integration/Continuous Delivery (CI/CD), automation and satellite communications modernization effort. In this position, we have an opportunity to analyze current systems and make recommendations for a consolidated and unified approach that meets the customer’s requirements.

jobs.title: DevOps Engineer
jobs.description: We are looking for motivated, talented, and experienced DevOps Engineers to help extend, design, build, and automate a CI/CD platform for the Navy's Consolidated Afloat Network Enterprise Services. In this role, you will be working with talented Software Developers, Network Engineers, System Administrators, Cyber Security Engineers, and DevOps Engineers to build out an automated CI/CD environment utilizing tools like Docker, Ansible, Jenkins, and more!

jobs.title: Staff Accountant
jobs.description: Solute Inc., established in San Diego, CA and with offices in Colorado and Maryland, is an innovative and dynamic organization that specializes in the fields of Engineering, Cyber Security, Enterprise Architecture, Program Management, Avionics Design, and more. We are currently looking to add a motivated individual to join our accounting team.

jobs.title: Inside Sales Representative 45k to 65k
jobs.description: We are looking for San Diego based inside sales consultants to work out of our downtown office. You will serve as an advisor by providing detailed information about our suite of social media and internet marketing services to local businesses. The ideal candidate is ambitious, career oriented and coachable.
